works with upsert on id
works with upsert on a composite key
works with upsert on a composite primary key
works with BLOBs
works with .field
works with primary key using .field
works with database functions
does not update when setting current values
works when two separate uniqueKeys are passed
works when indexes are created via indexes array
works when composite indexes are created via indexes array
should return default value set by the database (upsert)
works with upsert on id
works for table with custom primary key field
works for non incrementing primaryKey
